iaik.pdf.pdfbox

Class IAIKSignatureImplementation

  • java.lang.Object
    • iaik.pdf.pdfbox.IAIKSignatureImplementation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.interactive.digitalsignature.SignatureInterface

    public class IAIKSignatureImplementation
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.interactive.digitalsignature.SignatureInterface
    Implementation of the PDFBox SignatureInterface used to digest the data and to create the encoded CMS signature or timestamp token.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      IAIKSignatureImplementation(java.security.PrivateKey privKey, iaik.x509.X509Certificate[] certChain, PdfSignatureParameters params, int signedDataMode)
      Constructor taking all settings for creating the CMS signature.
      IAIKSignatureImplementation(java.lang.String tsaUrl, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String digestAlgorithm)
      Constructor taking all settings for creating the document timestamp.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      byte[] sign(java.io.InputStream content)
      Digest the document data to be signed and create the CMS signature or document timestamp.

    • Constructor Detail

      • IAIKSignatureImplementation

        public IAIKSignatureImplementation(java.security.PrivateKey privKey,
                                   iaik.x509.X509Certificate[] certChain,
                                   PdfSignatureParameters params,
                                   int signedDataMode)
        Constructor taking all settings for creating the CMS signature.
        Parameters:
        privKey - the private key used to sign the data.
        certChain - corresponding certificate chain to include in the CMS signature
        params - parameters defining some signature properties
        signedDataMode - SignedData.IMPLICIT or SignedData.EXPLICIT

      • IAIKSignatureImplementation

        public IAIKSignatureImplementation(java.lang.String tsaUrl,
                                   java.lang.String username,
                                   java.lang.String password,
                                   java.lang.String digestAlgorithm)
        Constructor taking all settings for creating the document timestamp.
        Parameters:
        tsaUrl - URL of the timestamp authority
        username - username for authorization
        password - password for authorization

    • Method Detail

                   java.io.IOException
        Digest the document data to be signed and create the CMS signature or document timestamp.
